name: seqinspector-sequencing-qc
title: SeqInspector - Sequencing QC
description: A comprehensive bioinformatics QC pipeline for inspecting sequencing data quality from Illumina, Oxford Nanopore, and PacBio platforms
content:
SeqInspector - Sequencing Quality Control

A comprehensive bioinformatics QC pipeline designed to inspect and assess the quality of sequencing data from multiple platforms including Illumina, Oxford Nanopore Technologies, and Pacific Biosciences.

Key Features

  • Multi-Platform Support: Works with sequencing data from various providers
  • Comprehensive QC Metrics: Assesses sequencing quality, duplication levels, and complexity on a per-sample basis
  • Adapter & Artifact Detection: Highlights adapter contents and technical artifacts
  • Contamination Detection: Facilitates detection of common biological contaminants
  • Flexible Reporting: Generates one global report for all samples plus group reports per unique tag

Pipeline Components

  • Read Subsampling: Uses Seqtk for efficient read subsampling
  • FastQC: Performs comprehensive read quality control analysis
  • FastQ Screen: Maps reads against reference genomes to detect contamination
  • SeqFu Stats: Generates detailed sequence quality metrics
  • MultiQC: Compiles all QC results into interactive HTML reports

Input Requirements

Provide a CSV or TSV samplesheet with the following columns:

  • sample - Custom sample name (required)
  • fastq_1 - Path to gzipped R1 FastQ file (required)
  • fastq_2 - Path to gzipped R2 FastQ file (optional, for paired-end)
  • rundir - Path to run folder (optional)
  • tags - Colon-separated tags for sample grouping (optional)

Output

The pipeline generates:

  • Global MultiQC Report: Comprehensive HTML report including all samples
  • Group Reports: Separate reports for samples sharing the same tag
  • FastQC Reports: Individual quality metrics for each sample
  • FastQ Screen Reports: Contamination screening results
  • SeqFu Stats: Detailed sequence statistics in TSV format
  • Pipeline Info: Execution reports, software versions, and parameters used

Use Cases

  • Initial quality assessment of sequencing runs
  • Detection of sequencing artifacts and technical issues
  • Contamination screening for sequencing core facilities
  • Comparative quality analysis across multiple samples or runs
  • Standardized QC reporting for genomics projects

Note: This pipeline is part of the nf-core community and is actively maintained by the Swedish National Genomics Infrastructure.
